channel.title: there is no way to change "showstats" key binding, and default keys option doesen't work
channel.description: Yo. So I was playing with my friend, and then I accidentally changed primary fire key to tab. When I changed it back, I wanted to change the showstats key back too. To my suprise, there was no option to do so in key menu. Desperated, I decided to just change keys to default settings. And then I realised that this didn't do anything, because my keys bindings stayed as it was. Those are some strange bugs. Repair it please, if you find some time.

item.title: there is no way to change "showstats" key binding, and default keys option doesen't work
item.dc:creator: LordDz
item.description:
Go to SteamApps\common\Black Mesa\bms\cfg
Open config.cfg with a text editor, I prefer Notepad++

Look for +showscores. Change whatever you have in the “” to “TAB”:
Yeah I understand you probably want the devs to patch a fix, but they will probably not as all their focus is on xen (and if they patched anything without including xen, they’d probably get a backlash for it).
